description: Returns an array of  RuleSummary objects.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: If you have more Rules than the number that you specified for Limit in the request, the response includes a NextMarker value. To list more Rules, submit another ListRules request, and specify the NextMarker value from the response in the NextMarker value in the next request.

nested_items.name: RuleId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for a Rule. You use RuleId to get more information about a Rule (see  GetRule), update a Rule (see  UpdateRule), insert a Rule into a WebACL or delete one from a WebACL (see  UpdateWebACL), or delete a Rule from AWS WAF (see  DeleteRule).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A friendly name or description of the  Rule. You can't change the name of a Rule after you create it.
